name: Mano Loca
description:
This is a small game I made for the 49th 1 Hour Game Jam, so it was made in about an hour. It's an homage to a toy I played with when I was a kid. The theme of the jam was "Sticky". I couldn't upload it in time, but I'm still uploading it late so have fun with it if you can.

The objective is to move the blocks from one side to the other using the sticky "hand".
